description: This is a Java class representing a JPA entity for a Note, including fields for id, title, content, tags, createdAt, and updatedAt, along with lifecycle hooks and accessors.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A JPA entity class that models a Note with attributes such as title, content, tags, createdAt, and updatedAt. Includes lifecycle hooks and methods for accessing and mutating the data.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Constructor initializing title, content, and tags from a list.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Pre-persist method to set creation and update timestamps.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Pre-update method to refresh the update timestamp.
